statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE energy_consumed <= 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_consumed > 500
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT device_id, TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(timestamp, HOUR) AS hour_timestamp, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns GROUP BY device_id, hour_timestamp ORDER BY total_energy DESC
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_energy_consumed > 50
SELECT * FROM energy_devices;
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM energy_devices ORDER BY power_consumption DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, power_consumption FROM energy_devices WHERE power_consumption > 100;
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM energy_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT device_name, SUM(power_consumption) AS total_power_consumption FROM energy_devices GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM energy_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM energy_devices WHERE power_consumption > 100;
SELECT device_id, device_name, power_consumption FROM energy_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM power_usage WHERE device_id = 2 AND energy_consumed < 50;
SELECT usage_id, usage_date, usage_time FROM power_usage ORDER BY usage_date ASC, usage_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Device ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT device_name, smart_home_id FROM Device WHERE smart_home_id = 1
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM Device WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT smart_home_id, COUNT(*) as total_devices FROM Device GROUP BY smart_home_id
SELECT device_name FROM Device;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT smart_home_name, location FROM SmartHome WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT device_name, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM Device JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Device.device_id = EnergyConsumption.device_id;
SELECT * FROM SmartHome ORDER BY smart_home_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SmartDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, power_consumption FROM SmartDevices WHERE power_consumption > 100;
SELECT device_name, location FROM SmartDevices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT log_timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, status FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM SmartDevices
SELECT device_name, location FROM SmartDevices WHERE power_consumption > 100
SELECT device_name, location, power_consumption FROM SmartDevices ORDER BY power_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyLogs JOIN SmartDevices ON EnergyLogs.device_id = SmartDevices.device_id
SELECT device_name, log_timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyLogs JOIN SmartDevices ON EnergyLogs.device_id = SmartDevices.device_id
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM smart_devices;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT optimization_date, optimized_power_consumption FROM power_optimization WHERE optimization_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT home_name, address FROM smart_homes ORDER BY home_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_devices;
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM smart_devices ORDER BY power_consumption DESC;
SELECT SUM(power_consumption) AS total_power_consumption FROM smart_devices;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, optimization_date, optimized_power_consumption FROM smart_devices JOIN power_optimization ON smart_devices.device_id = power_optimization.device_id;
